title: Highland Hellion
description: KATHERINE CAREWIllegitimate daughter of an English earl… Abducted to Scotland at age 14… No family, no reputation… No rulesROLFE MCTAVISHHeir to an honorable Highland laird… Can’t believe how well tomboy Kate can fight… About to learn how much of a woman she really isScotland is seething with plots, the vengeful Gordons are spoiling for a fight, and the neighboring clans are at each other’s throats. All it takes is a passionate hellion with a penchant for reckless adventure to ignite the Highlands once more.
author: Mary Wine
